networkError.title: Network Error
networkError.message: A network error caused the Audio download to fail part-way.

mediaDecode.title: Error in Decoding
mediaDecode.message: The Audio playback was aborted due to a corruption problem or because the Audio used features your browser did not support.

srcNotSupported.title: Media not supported
srcNotSupported.message: The Audio playback was aborted due to a corruption problem or because the Audio used features your browser did not support.

unknown.title: Unknown Error
unknown.message: Unknown Error occured please try again.

fileError.title: Audio File Error
fileError.message: Can Not play the audio file please check the file format OR Url.

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.message: If the subtitles are not displaying in the language you want, check the encoding setting above.

playback.title: Playback Error
playback.message: You aborted the video playback. Press Next OR Prev button to play Video

network.title: Network Error
network.message: A network error caused the video download to fail part-way. Press Next OR Prev button to play Video

media.title: Media Error
media.message: The video playback was aborted due to a corruption problem or because the video used features your browser did not support. Press Next OR Prev button to play Video

unsupportedFormat.title: Unsupported Format  Error
unsupportedFormat.message: The video could not be loaded, either because the server or network failed or because the format is not supported. Press Next OR Prev button to play Video

default.title: Unknown Error
default.message: An unknown error occurred. Press Next OR Prev button to play Video
